metadata.title: CVE-2015-1370 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in marked 0.3.2 and earlier for Node.jsallows remote attackers to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks via avbscript tag in a link.

criterions.comment: node-marked: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
